content.html:
Connections


ProblemSolution
The monitor is blank.The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor ( ≡ 272).
Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.EYE SENSOR is selected for VIEW MODE SETTING > PLAYBACK: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different VIEW MODE SETTING option (□□ 207).
No picture or sound on TV.The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly ( �� 272). Input on the television is set to "TV": Set input to "HDMI" (□□ 272). The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the tele- vision to adjust the volume ( �� 272).
The computer does not recognize the camera.Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (□□ 277).
FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.Check the option selected for PC CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable (□□ 284).
Cannot connect to iPhones or iPads.ON is selected for USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING. Se- lect OFF when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that do not supply power (□□ 240).
Cannot connect to smartphone.Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connec- tor with which the smartphone is equipped ( ≡ 281).
Technical
Notes
12
310
content.markdown:
# Connections

| Problem | Solution |
| --- | --- |
| The monitor is blank. | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor ( ≡ 272). |
| Both the TV and camera monitor are blank. | EYE SENSOR is selected for VIEW MODE SETTING > PLAYBACK: Put your eye to the viewfinder or choose a different VIEW MODE SETTING option (□□ 207). |
| No picture or sound on TV. | The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly ( �� 272). Input on the television is set to "TV": Set input to "HDMI" (□□ 272). The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the tele- vision to adjust the volume ( �� 272). |
| The computer does not recognize the camera. | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (□□ 277). |
| FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera. | Check the option selected for PC CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable (□□ 284). |
| Cannot connect to iPhones or iPads. | ON is selected for USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING. Se- lect OFF when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that do not supply power (□□ 240). |
| Cannot connect to smartphone. | Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connec- tor with which the smartphone is equipped ( ≡ 281). |
